room_title: Escape room "Gold Mine: Last Breath" by Escape Rooms Portland Michigan in Lansing
room_description: After entering the Cortez Gold Mine for the final tour of the day a machine started to malfunction, causing the mine to collapse. The crew on the outside is monitoring the oxygen levels and have communicated there is only one hour left of air. The rescue team will be helping you along the way, but you must gather the foremanâ€™s plans to blow the rubble away before time runs out and you take your last breath.
